remarks: A condition allowing swap of uniqueness and existential quantifiers. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 7-Apr-2017.)  (Revised by NM, 16-Jun-2017.)
statement:
2reuswapdc $p |- ( DECID E. x E. y ( x e. A /\ ( y e. B /\ ph ) ) -> ( A. x e. A E* y e. B ph -> ( E! x e. A E. y e. B ph -> E! y e. B E. x e. A ph ) ) ) $.
$d A x y $.
$d B x $.
